array.name: Salmon With Creamy Cucumber-Fennel Salad
array.description: To speed up pre-dinner prep time, make the side salad up to 12 hours in advance; serve cool or at room temperature.

array.name: Spicy Salmon With Bok Choy and Rice
array.description: Baste the fish with a mixture of honey, soy sauce, and crushed red pepper to give it a tasty glaze.

array.name: Shrimp, Leek, and Spinach Pasta
array.description: While the pasta cooks, saut√© the leeks and shrimp in butter. The spinach will wilt naturally when combined with the warm pasta.
